You portray an employee seeking power, prestige, and wealth…at any cost. You’ll sabotage your rivals’ pet projects, destroy them at social events, steal their secrets, or even kill them and cover it all up. In the process, you’ll rise up the ranks, make new enemies, and discover new goals.

This is an all-in-one game book with full rules for players and GMs.

228149.name: Warhammer Quest 2: The End Times
228149.description:
User Summary

A cataclysm was prophesied to bring about the end of the Old World. Now the forces of Chaos have begun their final assault and the last stand is coming.

228150.name: Mordheim: Warband Skirmish
228150.description:
User Summary

Explore the ruins of the City of Mordheim, clash with other scavenging warbands and collect Wyrdstone - valuable shards from the comet that destroyed the city.

228170.name: Archmages: Dead or Alive
228170.description:
User Summary

The characters find themselves in a Petri-dish where they are searching for a missing wizard. They must fight against germs and other giant creatures scaled to match their current size.

228171.name: Cosmic Express
228171.description:
Cosmic Express is a puzzle video game that tasks players with constructing train tracks inside spacedomes to transports passengers to their destinations.

Source: Wikipedia, "[en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cosmic_Express Cosmic Express]", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

228179.name: Disc League
228179.description:
Fast PvP disc combat with dedicated servers and stunning visuals. Master the spinning, curving and bouncing of your disc through multiple arenas online with other intelligent beings (be they human or otherwise).

Source: The Game Website.

228180.name: Ravenfield
228180.description:
User Summary

Take down those pesky Reds using helicopters, tanks, guns, and active ragdoll physics.

228181.name: Cooking Witch
228181.description:
In Cooking Witch you are a witch flying to a party in the woods, abducting the children and cooking and eating them.

Source: The Developer Website.

228185.name: KARMA
228185.description:
UNRELEASED GAME




This game has not been released yet, therefore some of the information above may change in the future. Until this game is released, please don't submit images for it unless given direct written permission from the publisher which must be noted in the image caption.




Publisher's blurb:

KARMA is a brand new, GM-less, story roleplaying game. It comes complete with 8 exciting modules and streamlined, easy-to-learn rules.

228187.name: Entartete Kunst
228187.description:
Publisher's blurb:

The most significant roleplaying game of our own or any generation.

• Tedious and difficult to learn
• Enormous preparation required
• Complex, inflexible, and artificial
• Hidebound execution
• No attempt at verisimilitude
• Incapable of supporting any genre

228189.name: Cogent Roleplay Core Rule Book
228189.description:
From the introduction:

Welcome to Cogent Roleplay - a Tabletop Pen and Paper Role-playing game that is easy to learn, flexible, comprehensive, sophisticated and of course loads of fun. The Cogent Roleplaying System aims to provide you with the tools you need to experience adventures as any character you can imagine, such as a great hero, scoundrel, villain, thief, rogue or any other. Your stories will unfold in all kinds of worlds and settings, such as classic medieval fantasy, science fiction, space opera, zombie apocalypse, steampunk, superhero - or something of your own unique creation. Have fun, be fearless and create your own stories worthy of the greatest myths, legends and chronicles!

228190.name: Cogent Roleplay Character Sheet
228190.description:
User summary:

This character sheet is intended as a print-and-play component. The game logo is in color; the remainder of the sheet is in black and white.

The sheet is provided in two formats - a standard and a "small" format. They contain the same components but feature different layout and size.

228191.name: Cogent Roleplay Cheat Sheet
228191.description:
User summary:

This two-page PDF document is intended for print-and-play use, and is full-color. It is suitable for use as a two-panel play screen or simply as a play reference.

228192.name: The Infectious Madness of Doctor Dekker
228192.description:
YOU are a psychiatrist, trying to solve a murder whilst treating the unusual patients of the recently deceased Doctor Dekker. Type a question - patients reply in full screen video and have questions for you too but be careful what you say. Your words determine their eventual fates, and your own!

Source: The Game Website.

228193.name: Oafmatch
228193.description:
Oafmatch is a role-playing game that combines traditional RPG turn-based combat with match-three and roguelike mechanics.Go into battle with four party members from thirty playable classes, power up weapons by making colored gem matches, then unleash devastating attacks on your enemies!

Source: The Game Website.

228194.name: Shotgun Farmers
228194.description:
Shotgun Farmers is the Online Multiplayer shooter where your bullets grow the guns. Harvest weapon plants quickly for more ammo or let them grow for a larger clip.

Source: The Game Website.

228195.name: sphereFACE
228195.description:
sphereFACE is a retro-styled 3D vector shooter, wrapped around the inside of a sphere.

Source: The Developer Website.

228196.name: Journey Of Johann
228196.description:
User Summary

Journey of Johann is an action adventure platformer with puzzle elements.

228197.name: The Falling Nights
228197.description:
The player takes the role of Jake Lawrence, a father who will do anything to protect his daughter Rachel. Both are involved in an accident in which Rachel disappears mysteriously. Jake has to look for his daughter while strange events happen around him.

Source: The Developer Website.

228198.name: Pox Nora
228198.description:
Delve into classic turn-based strategy gaming with elements of table top miniatures, fantasy RPG and TCG style gameplay all wrapped into one.

Source: The Game Website.

228199.name: Deliriant
228199.description:
Explore pain and coping through the home of a tormented suburban family in the 1970s.

Source: The Publisher Website.

228200.name: Puzzle Showdown 4K
228200.description:
User Summary

Puzzle Showdown 4K is a fun new way to build jigsaw puzzles.

228201.name: SmuggleCraft
228201.description:
As a smuggler, your hovercraft is your life. Customize your hovercraft to fit your needs and traverse the dangerous SideWays to increase your reputation. Evade the authorities and aid the many inhabitants of Dirahl to prove you’re the best smuggler around.

Source: The Game Website.

228202.name: 100 Rumours to Hear in a Town or Village
228202.description:
Publisher's Blurb

Players will often ask around in towns and villages trying to find out useful information. This lists 100 different rumours for them to hear.

The rumours are aimed at a fantasy setting and are most suited to towns and villages rather than cities, as the last tends to focus more on urban events, but some can still be used in such a setting.

The rumours may or may not be true, at the GM's decision. They can simply be used as background flavour to make a setting seem more alive, to hide important information amongst the dross or perhaps as adventure hooks themselves, if they are fleshed out.

Here is a sample result:

Did you see that weird bloke who was in the inn? Tattoos, piercings and sharpened teeth! I can’t see anyone who looks like that being up to something good.

228203.name: Tribe Name Generator
228203.description:
Publisher's Blurb

Many game and stories have tribes. Some view them as primitives, others as having achieved the perfect balance between civilisation and nature. They are not limited to any one race, with tribes being found across all worlds and empires.

Whatever the nature of the tribe, they need a name, one by which the outside world knows them. Their true name is often more rich and detailed then the one presented to non-tribal members. Or they could just be very simple being who can’t use their imagination very well.

This tribe name generator is aimed at those tribes with what can best be described as an orcish way of naming. It is by no means complete and is ideal for a starting point for your own ideas as well.

228205.name: Tribe Details Generator
228205.description:
Publisher's Blurb

Tribes exist in almost all games and genres. Some view them as noble savages in tune with the world; others believe them to be uncivilised animals, with the truth being something else entirely.

This generator, or series of tables, is designed to help flesh out any needed details you require for your tribe. Use all of them or just one, they are entirely optional.

For each aspect of a tribe, a question is asked. This is normally something that can be answered in a few words or a sentence or two at maximum. When coming up with your own ideas try to stick to this guideline as much as possible.

You may find that when rolling on all of the tables that you get odd results that at first glance do not make sense, such as a mountain based tribe trading in horses. Use this as a sour of inspiration for truly original tribes.

The various aspects covered are:


Ceremony
Clothing
Combat
Favoured Colour
Favoured Weapon
Headdress
Known for
Leader
Magic
Movement
Population
Possessions
Race
Relaxation
Symbol
Tattoos
Terrain
Totem/Spirit Animal
Trade
View of outsiders


Lastly, if you need a name for your tribe, then the Tribe Name Generator by Ennead Games is available.

228206.name: Monster Slayers - Fire and Steel Expansion
228206.description:
- Two new locations (Volcanic Tunnels and the Old Castle)
- Four new bosses (Fire Golem, Demon Lord, Iron Golem and Knight Champion)
- Eight new enemies (2 for each new location, 4 for all locations, including a Griffin, a Centaur and a Wraith!)
- Two new player classes (the Dragon and the Merchant!)
- Seven new cards from Companions!

Source: The Developer Website.

228211.name: Block Zombies!
228211.description:
In a world gone wrong, one girl stands alone. Alone, but not unarmed!

Source: The Publisher Website.

228212.name: Unit 4
228212.description:
Fast paced platforming action, cooperative gameplay up to 4 players, an elite squad of agents with amazing skills, space travels, exploration, unique missions, fancy characters, incredible fights with huge bosses, trade, minigames and much more!

Source: The Developer Website.

228213.name: Summon Night 6: Lost Borders
228213.description:
The game takes place in the world of Fillujah, a world where all people have their own flying companion creature. The core three characters of the cast, Raj, Amu, and Ist, are all original characters, though the game plot involves them meeting up with suddenly-appearing strangers, who actually make up of character from prior Summon Night entries.

Source: Wikipedia, "[en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Summon_Night_6 Summon Night 6]", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

228214.name: Spellspire
228214.description:
User Summary

Spellspire is a thrilling mashup of word game and action role playing game.

228215.name: Capitalism Lab
228215.description:
Capitalism Lab is a major expansion for Capitalism 2 with a host of new features and improvements, for experienced users of Capitalism 2. If you are new to the Capitalism series, you are recommended to get your hands on Capitalism 2 first, which contains well crafted tutorials for learning the game.

Source: [www.capitalism2.com The Game Website].

228220.name: Armor & Clothing Quick Generator
228220.description:
When finding treasure, or describing an item a character is wearing, sometimes all you need to know is the condition, the material or what it is, or even a combination of all 3.

This quick generator gives you a one line description of a piece of armor or clothing, with a few accessories thrown in to help fill the gaps. The actual details of what these items look like or their value is up to you.

This generator does NOT create full details, but something quick and simple, afterall sometimes you don't need full details about what those orcs are wearing or what you found in the Queens closet. You can use it to determine just the condition, the material or even just the peice of armor or clothing you have found, or any combination of the three.

Featuring:


100 possible conditions - some good,some bad, others a mixture of the two
100 materials - From the realistic, to the rare, to the downright odd and impratical
100 armor/clothing peices - Coveing hats to gloves to dresses and more
1,000,000 (more if the combination variations are used) possible combinations
100 pre-generated examples, such as -


+ Antique gambeson
+ Marvellous fake fur trench coat
+ Velvet cape

228221.name: Armor & Clothing Quick Generator Sci-Fi/Modern Edition
228221.description:
When finding treasure, or describing an item a character is wearing, sometimes all you need to know is the condition, the material or what it is, or even a combination of all 3.

This quick generator gives you a one line description of a piece of armor or clothing, with a few accessories thrown in to help fill the gaps. The actual details of what these items look like or their value etc., is up to you.

Featuring:

100 item conditions, from the realistic to the absurd
100 possible materials , from the pratical to the dangerous
100 peices of armor, clothing or accessories , such as shirts, helmets and jockstraps
In total over 1,000,000 possible combinations if you use the variations
Easy integration with "Armor & Clothing Quick Generator" (also by Ennead Games) for even more possible combinations!




Plus 100 examples to get you started, such as:


Acid damaged hoodie
Holographic breastplate
Regenerating carbon fibre jockstrap

228222.name: Global Soccer Manager 2017
228222.description:
https://www.facebook.com/GlobalSoccerManager/

In Global Soccer Manager 2017 there are no restrictions, the whole world becomes playable! The 210 playable nations and the 4000+ playable clubs guarantees truely infinite hours to play.

228223.name: GREYMEN: A Post-Apocalyptic Band Reunion
228223.description:
User Summary

A unique blend of exploration and strategy.

228224.name: Aeon
228224.description:
https://www.facebook.com/illusionranger/

Aeon is a VR shooting game. Use your Time control(slow motion) ability, sharp swords and heavy calibre pistols to kill enemies! Realistic details of hit reactions, Real-time sword cutting system, Advanced IK to let you see your whole body.

228225.name: Delila's Gift
228225.description:
Delila's Gift is a VR Picture book created using Tiltbrush! It tells the story of a small sea creature named Delila and her struggle to understand belonging, ownership, fear, othering, and the darkness surrounding her.

Source: The Developer Website.

228234.name: Hatsuden
228234.description:
Our new release, HATSUDEN will be on sale in Spring Game Market, Tokyo (May 14th, 2017). The Tokyo German Game Award nominee is now officially published from New Games Order, LLC. (in collaboration with Yukainasakana). This is a game of 2 players with a theme of electricity supply. Although minimal in system and play time, it has a thrilling game plot and the results are never predictable. This is a game for players of all range. Please have a try.

Construct 5 types of renewable energy plant (Solar, Geothermal, Wind, Hydro, Biomass) and complete your supply to the city. Compete for greater electricity, also making sure to keep just the right amount for your city’s demand. The special technology cards also play a big role as the game develops. Now, head out to the journey to become a great “HATSUDEN” engineer.
